headline: Jim Cramer Urges to “Buy NXPI”
summary: NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s spotlight. A caller asked for Cramer’s opinion of the company, and he replied: “Oh my god. So you know… we got a Texas Instruments upgrade early today. We got an Analog Devices upgrade earlier this week. NXPI is the last of the Internet […]
